description.value:
The spider is a patient hunter, sensing foes that struggle in its webs.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 competence bonus on Climb checks, Stealth checks, saving throws against web effects (magical or otherwise), and checks to break free of webs.

This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a giant spider. While in this form, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, tremorsense with a range of 10 feet, a climb speed of 30 feet, the web special attack, and a bite attack (1d6).

At 8th level, you gain a +4 racial bonus on Perception checks, and the range of your tremorsense increases to 20 feet.

At 15th level, you gain Improved Natural Attack (bite), and the range of your tremorsense increases to 30 feet.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)
